title: 我需要一个工业风格的主城
author: timecb7

replies.author: kongrenxuan
replies.txt_content: 个人比较喜欢简单干净一点的主城，这里就有一个http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-802053-1-1.html楼主看看喜不喜欢

replies.author: shuai_youxin
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-344637-1-1.html
